channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Quick Sort Template
item.description: Quick Sort def quick(q, l, r): if l >= r: return p, i, j = q[l + r >> 1], l - 1, r + 1 while i < j: while 1: i += 1 if q[i] >= p: break while 1: j -= 1 if q[j] <= p: break if i < j: q[i], q[j] = q[j], q[i] quick(q, l, j) quick(q, j + 1, r)

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello World! I’m here! nothing happend? lastone
